reference.title: Host details
reference.shortdesc: The Hosts page on the VVols tab provides information about VMware ESXi hosts that host virtual volumes.

refbody.section: The following information is displayed:Host ID The UUID for the ESXi host that hosts virtual volumes and is known to the cluster.Host AddressThe IP address or DNS name for the ESXi host.BindingsBinding IDs for all virtual volumes bound by the ESXi host.ESX Cluster IDThe vSphere host cluster ID or vCenter GUID.Initiator IQNsInitiator IQNs for the virtual volume host.SolidFire Protocol Endpoint IDsThe protocol endpoints that are currently visible to the ESXi host.
